column2: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud
Node Notation
Gameplay Notes / Player Path (Outside Script)
Extra Notes
*bold* _italics_ &actions/prose/narration&

[PAUSE] — Goes to next character line and pauses before they start talking, like they're at a loss for words.  
[SHAKE] — Violently shakes the screen once, as if a Character were suddenly shouting, goes with the line following it.
[NODE: "Beacon2Victory.1"]
"Approach Beacon after completing Battle 1"
Up here!
&The bird circles around the beacon, white wings beating in the air.&
I see it!
&Troubadour shields his eyes from the sun, proudly peering up at the beacon and the bird.&
&He looks at you, expectant, grinning.&
Shall we?
&You smile back and open your mouth to reply-&
Can we get this over with already?
&Blackguard looks annoyed, hanging behind the group.&
&Lighthouse spares him a glance, unimpressed.&
Got somewhere to be?
&You think you see the corners of her mouth quirk up.&
The next beacon, of course!
&Troubadour gives Blackguard two thumbs up, nodding enthusiastically.&
Blackguard is totally right - we've got a mission to complete!
Hey, wait a second-
&You see Lighthouse elbow Blackguard to cut him off.&
Dreamer, if you would?
Well... here goes!
You touch the beacon with the flat of you palm. Just like before, the cool stone begins to vibrate and buzz.
[SHAKE]
You brace yourself as the ground begins to shudder again.
[SHAKE]
The golden glow erupts into a mighty pillar of light that the bird continues to circle.
WOW!
It really is beautiful...
Have you ever seen anything like it?
&Blackguard rolls his eyes with a snort.&
Yeah, you  ever seen a searchlight before?
&You hear him grunt and you look over just in time to see Lighthouse giving him a swat.&
If all the battles coming up are this easy, we'll be done in no time at all.
&Troubadour laughs as he begins back down the path.&
I think this is the beginning of an awesome new adventure - what's the rush, Dreamer?
There's no rush - it's just... we're almost halfway through already.
&He turns to grin at you.&
Well, we'll just have to enjoy the time we get - don't want it to end too soon, right?
I don't see what there's to even enjoy.
We're basically free labor for this-
&Blackguard jabs a thumb at the bird gliding overhead.&
-big bleached chicken.
Don't be rude, Blackguard.
Chickens can't fly.
&You look up at the bird as it soars on ahead.&
&The bird stays silent as you and your group walk on.&
[ENDNODE]
